TopicTitle: Just to say hi to the KSP community

Articles.Content:
Hey everybody.

I bought KSP about three weeks ago and I was sold after the first ridculous crash landing. In the beginning I've played some of Scott Manley's tutorials, just to get the basics. After that I've been learning more and more. By this time I've landed on Minmus and back safely, and ready to go to another planet. This game really drags you in. Awesome.

I must say that I'm very thankfull and impressed with all the effort Squad puts in this gem. I have the fullest confidence this will only get better.

Second I want to say I'm very impressed with the stuff many of you make. So often I see ideas that I couldn't think of or thought was impossible, was made true by some of you guys. Some even seems "easy". Very impressed.

Anyway, just saying hi.
